medium: Cotton, stripwoven dyed red from bark of Goolobe tree.
title: Man's Shirt (Saya Woloru Woderu)
description: cotton, strip-woven dyed red from bark of Gollobe tree; red color represents blood and a particular cow (nage woderu); shirt worn by wealthy Fulani on important feast days; stored w/86.100.18,.20,.28,.29
creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
